pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo aciravatiyā nadiyā vesiyāhi saddhiṁ naggā ekatitthe nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.4_0: “kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhākaṁ, ayye, daharānaṁ brahmacariyaṁ ciṇṇena, nanu nāma kāmā paribhuñjitabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.5_0: Yadā jiṇṇā bhavissatha tadā brahmacariyaṁ carissatha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.6_0: Evaṁ tumhākaṁ ubho atthā pariggahitā bhavissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.8_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo upassayaṁ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.11_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.12_0: “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.15_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.6_0: anivatthā vā apārutā vā nahāyati, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
